metadata.title: CVE-2024-10460 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The origin of an external protocol handler prompt could have been obscuredusing a data: URL within an `iframe`. This vulnerability affects Firefox <132, Firefox ESR < 128.4, Thunderbird < 128.4, and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
